name: ListCustomAuthorizationServers
description:
Retrieve all custom authorization servers for the organization.

Use this tool to get a list of all custom authorization servers configured in the Okta organization. Useful for managing and reviewing authorization server configurations.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Search for matching values in the `name` and `audiences` of authorization servers.

value_schema.description: Searches the `name` and `audiences` of authorization servers for matching values

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of authorization server results to return per page. Maximum value is 200.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of authorization server results on a page. Maximum value: 200

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of authorization servers. Use the value obtained from the next link of the previous response.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of authorization servers. Treat as an opaque value and obtain through the next link relationship.
